languages.text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.
languages.original_text: Для всех {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверок{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} навигатор использует значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}, если это значение выше, чем у необходимой {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}. Если значение Воли навигатора выше, чем Выносливости, то для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} используется Воля.

traits.locale_text: The Navigator makes all resistance checks with their Willpower if it is higher than the base characteristic for such tests. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than Toughness, the Navigator's wounds are calculated according to their Willpower.

The Navigator makes all resistance tests with their Willpower if it is higher than the base characteristic for such tests. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's wounds are calculated according to their Willpower.

The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

languages.text: Для всех {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверок{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} навигатор использует значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g}, если это значение выше, чем у необходимой {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g}. Если значение Воли навигатора выше, чем Выносливости, то для расчета {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} используется Воля.
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Для всех проверок на сопротивление навигатор использует значение Воли, если это значение выше, чем у необходимой характеристики. Если значение Воли навигатора выше, чем Выносливости, то для расчета здоровья используется Воля.

Для всех проверок на сопротивление навигатор использует значение Воли, если это значение выше, чем у необходимой характеристики. Если значение Воли навигатора выше, чем Выносливости, то для расчета здоровья используется Воля.

languages.text: 导航者进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，如果{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}基础{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}更高，则可以基于意志进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果导航者的意志高于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}，则导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}将会基于意志进行计算。
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g}, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

traits.locale_text: 导航者进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，如果{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}基础属性更高，则可以基于意志进行{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。如果导航者的意志高于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}，则导航者的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}将会基于意志进行计算。

languages.text: El navegante realiza todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} usando {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} si es mayor que la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} base necesaria para esa {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}. Si la Voluntad del navegante es mayor que su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del navegante se calculan utilizando su Voluntad.
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

traits.locale_text: El navegante realiza todas las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} usando {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} si es mayor que la característica base necesaria para esa {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g}. Si la Voluntad del navegante es mayor que su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del navegante se calculan utilizando su Voluntad.

languages.text: Der Navigator macht alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} mit seiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, wenn diese höher ist als die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Grundeigenschaft{/g} für solche {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g}. Wenn die Willenskraft des Navigators höher ist als seine Zähigkeit, werden die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Navigators entsprechend seiner Willenskraft berechnet.
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Der Navigator macht alle {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} mit seiner {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}, wenn diese höher ist als die Grundeigenschaft für solche {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g}. Wenn die Willenskraft des Navigators höher ist als seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}, werden die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Navigators entsprechend seiner Willenskraft berechnet.

languages.text: Le navigateur passe tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} avec sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} si celle-ci est supérieure à la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} de base de ces {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Si la Volonté du navigateur est supérieure à son Endurance, ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} sont calculées en fonction de sa Volonté.
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

traits.locale_text: Le Navigateur passe tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} avec sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} si celle-ci est supérieure à la caractéristique de base de ces {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. Si la Volonté du Navigateur est supérieure à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} sont calculées en fonction de sa Volonté.

languages.text: 航宙士は、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}において、その判定で使用する{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}よりも{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の方が高い場合、意志力で{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を行う。航宙士の意志力が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}よりも高い場合、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}は意志力に基づいて計算される。
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士は、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}において、その{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}で使用する能力よりも{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の方が高い場合、意志力で判定を行う。航宙士の意志力が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}タフネス{/g}よりも高い場合、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}は意志力に基づいて計算される。

languages.text: Rotacı, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testlerini{/g} o tür {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testler{/g} için gereken temel {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikten{/g} yüksekse {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliğiyle yapar. Rotacı'nın İrade'si Dayanıklılık niteliğinden yüksekse Rotacı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanları İrade niteliğine göre hesaplanır.
languages.original_text: The Navigator makes all {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} with their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} if it is higher than the base {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g} for such {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. If the Navigator's Willpower is higher than their Toughness, the Navigator's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are calculated according to their Willpower.
